page.title: 17INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY
page.content: In 1985 the age of modern technology has come.Many families have home computers which are used for both educational and entertainment purposes.The range of computers is getting larger and larger.In everyday life the computer is also coming in.In some shops,instead of a cash-register,they have small strips over which a light pen is rubbed and the price of the item comes up at the till.In office and business work,technology plays a big part.A lot of information is stored on disk for computers.Letters are mainly printed on word processors which are much quicker than manual typewriters.In factories computers and robots are coming in more and more and replacing the jobs of many workers.Industrial work is worked alot by computers as well.
